name: Lost Impact (Maroufleurs)
description:
All murders are different but have the same consequence. But to know how a crime has been done, you will have to reproduce it properly. You have a gift for that in your hands, make use of the clues and your deduction to reconstruct the murder.

You are Esther, a ballistics inspector, endorsed by the local police. This miserable city is burying far to much crime victims. but at least for you, is certainly no lack of job. Go to the bar between each case. Take some informations or relax a bit. Life isn't just about work.

FEATURES:
  •  First person deduction and puzzle solving game
  •  Storytelling
  • "Take your time" game | No gameover
  •  Film Noir | Comics
**Warning: contains or depicts the use of illegal drugs, alcohol or tobacco, contains bad language, blood and weapons use** ____________________________________________ -IN DEVELOPMENT-

If interested in following the progress → Twitter | Discord | Youtube
